mapper.select: select part.parts_type as status, count(*) as totalCount from ope_production_parts part where part.dr = 0 and part.disable = 0 and part.announ_user_id=#{userId} group by part.parts_type
select count(*) from ope_production_parts part left join ope_production_part_price_sheet sheet on part.id = sheet.production_id and sheet.dr = 0 and sheet.production_type = part.parts_type

select part.id as id, part.parts_no as productN, part.cn_name as productCnName, part.en_name as productEnName, part.fr_name as productFrName, part.parts_type as type, part.updated_time as refuseTime, sheet.price as productPrice, sheet.currency_unit as unit from ope_production_parts part left join ope_production_part_price_sheet sheet on part.id = sheet.production_id and sheet.dr = 0 and sheet.production_type = part.parts_type
limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select ifnull(avg(histroy.price), 0) as avg, ifnull(max(histroy.price), 0) as max from ope_production_part_price_history histroy where histroy.dr=0 and histroy.created_by=#{userId} and histroy.production_id=#{id} order by histroy.updated_time desc

select histroy.id as id, histroy.price as productFrPrice, histroy.currency_unit as productFrUnit, histroy.updated_time as refuseTime from ope_production_part_price_history histroy where histroy.dr = 0 and histroy.created_by =#{userId} and histroy.production_id =#{id} order by histroy.created_time asc
